participants.name: Chris Kern
participants.title: Internet Media, Business Strategist and Corporate Finance Specialist. I Help Companies Grow & Increase Shareholder Value

messages.message: One of our partners in the financial services market has a opening for a full-time Ruby developer and CTO... Interested?
It's not as cool as JavaScript.
Pretty sure they're doing angular js and a few other things in the mix... high end financial services play that integrates with other institutions and manages specific types of transactions..
Fintech is full of fraud. My current employment has unlimited PTO. Thank you for thinking of me though!

This is FinTech, but regulated by the SEC and FINRA as they deal with investment banks and trading firms so can be certain fraud is not in the mix here. If you know of any other great Ruby/Java developers - feel free to refer them over.. Thanks Brian!
What is the SEC doing about Wells Fargo? SEC can't be trusted.
If you want to go down that road - we can say that about any governmental institution and be paranoid for the rest of our lives...
i just don't think in those terms and otherwise understand what I'm dealing with and work around that.. This Ruby/JS developer role is for a partner company of ours, not my company...
